Original:
進門後立馬有女服務生熱情接待
店內風格呈現暗黑卻不失奢華風格
我們點了四道餐點：
①宮城生蠔
店家特製的葡萄柚醬油與檸檬的點綴，更增添了生蠔的鮮甜，生蠔肥美大顆，推薦。
②金沙松阪豬
鹹蛋及水蓮翻炒再加入嫩松阪豬，整體鹹香是非常棒的下酒菜！金沙與水蓮的香氣在上桌時就撲鼻而來。
③法式雞腿排牛肝菌燉飯
這個超頂！可惜若是飯量再多一些就好了，烤腿排外皮微酥、肉質軟嫩，而燉飯起司濃郁奶香十足，選用的牛肝菌幫這道菜凸顯出了特色！
④牛肉韃靼
主體為生牛肉加上洋蔥、酸豆、葡萄柚等佐料，在之前沒有體驗過生牛肉，此店的生牛肉調味偏鹹、口感似生鮪魚再有嚼勁點，搭配店家獨特發酵烤土司很絕配！一定要先吃吃看原味吐司，特別。
這間酒吧既有氣氛又有賓至如歸感，是個值得約會、小酌的地點。
EN:
Immediately after entering the door, a female service student warmly received a warm reception
The style of the store shows dark but luxurious style
We ordered four meals:
① Miyagi Oyster
The special -made grapefruit soy sauce and lemon embellishment of the shop also adds the sweetness of oysters, the oysters are beautiful and large, and it is recommended.
② Jinshasona pig
Salted eggs and water lotus are stir -fry and then add Nen pine pigs. The overall salty fragrance is a great dish!The aroma of Sands and Water Lotus came up when they were served.
③ French chicken thighs stewed rice stewed rice
This super -top!Unfortunately, if the amount of rice is more, the grilled legs are slightly crispy and the meat is soft and tender. The stewed cheese is full of milk fragrance.
④ Beef 鞑靼
The main body is raw beef, onion, sour beans, grapefruit and other condiments. I have not experienced raw beef before. The raw beef of this shop is salty, and the taste is like a raw catfish and then chewed. Tusi is very perfect!Be sure to eat the original toast first, especially.
This bar has both the atmosphere and the guests and feelings. It is a place worth dating and drinking.

從調酒、餐食、服務和店內裝潢處處可以感受到老闆的用心，已成為台北最喜歡的酒吧之一。

有時候還能遇到療癒的店兔🐰

You can feel the boss's intention everywhere from bartending, meal, service and interior decoration, and have become one of the favorite bars in Taipei.

Sometimes you can encounter the healing shop rabbit 🐰

Original: 我和我的朋友分享了三種雞尾酒：狗雞尾酒、鯊魚雞尾酒和粉紅火蜥蜴雞尾酒。酒量雖然不大，但味道都很棒！粉紅蠑螈是我們的最愛。工作人員也非常友好而且服務非常快。我肯定會回去嘗試他們的其他雞尾酒！

Original:
這裡的雞尾酒讓我很驚訝！他們以十二生肖為靈感，調製出雞尾酒。我試了4個，都很好吃，而且很滑。我必須回來嘗試其餘的🤩

這裡的氣氛很好，有沙發區和酒吧區。坐在沙發區與朋友聊天很不錯，坐在吧台則可以輕鬆與調酒師互動。所有的調酒師都非常好！他們很幽默，很友好，如果你有任何問題就問他們。 ☺️
EN:
The cocktail here surprised me!They were inspired by the Zodiac to prepare cocktails.I tried 4, all delicious and slippery.I have to come back and try the rest

The atmosphere here is very good, there are sofa areas and bar areas.Sitting in the sofa area is very good to chat with friends. Sitting on the bar can easily interact with the bartender.All bartenders are very good!They are humorous and friendly, and ask them if you have any questions.☺️

Original:
很棒的手工雞尾酒和真正有創意的組合！糖漿的所有東西都是手工製作的，並付出了很多努力來與香料和茶等各種成分創造出有趣的搭配。 他們的飲料還使用動物代表，這也是一個非常好的感覺。 （12 種基於您的生肖的特色飲料以及幾種特殊的動物靈感飲料）

強烈推薦給尋找獨特雞尾酒的人
EN:
A great handmade cocktail and a truly creative combination!Everything in the syrup is handmade, and has made a lot of effort to create interesting combinations with various ingredients such as spices and tea.Their drinks also use animal representatives, which is also a very good feeling.(12 special beverages based on your zodiac and several special animal inspiration drinks)

Strongly recommend it to those who look for unique cocktails

Original:
地點優越（靠近地鐵站，街對面就是 Ubike 車站）。大約有 30 種雞尾酒，其中大多數都以動物名字命名，以模仿其觸感或味道。如果你想探索一些有創意的東西，這是一個非常有趣的地方。

我唯一擔心的是素食選擇很少。但我相信他們正在更新菜單，還會有更多的菜餚🤩
EN:
The location is superior (near the subway station, the opposite street is Ubike Station).About 30 cocktails, most of which are named after the animal name to imitate their touch or taste.If you want to explore something creative, this is a very interesting place.

The only thing I worry about is that there are few vegetarian choices.But I believe they are updating the menu, and there will be more dishes.

Original:
充滿活力的酒吧，員工熱情好客，提供以十二生肖（即從老鼠到豬）概念為基礎的創意雞尾酒，以及結合基酒、茶和其他元素的配方。
我們喝了老鼠和豬的雞尾酒（400新台幣一杯），帶有淡淡的茉莉花綠茶和普洱（一種過度發酵的茶）的味道。整體來說味道令人愉快，但偏清淡。
不幸的是，墨魚丸和梅子雞（小盤酒吧食品；每件低於新台幣300元）煮得太過（或炸得太過），因此有點太耐嚼了。
酒吧本身空間不大，座位有限，舒適度也受到限制。
音樂選擇的品味：平庸。
EN:
A vibrant bar, employees are enthusiastic and hospitable, providing creative cocktails based on the concept of the zodiac (that is, from mice to pigs), as well as formulas combined with base wine, tea and other elements.
We drank the cocktails of mice and pigs (a cup of NT $ 400), with a touch of jasmine green tea and Pu'er (a kind of over -fermented tea).Overall the taste is pleasant, but it is light.
Unfortunately, cuttlefish balls and plum chicken (small disk bar food; each one is less than NT $ 300) cooked too much (or fried too much), so it was a bit too chewy.
The bar itself has little space, limited seats, and restrictions on comfort.
Taste of music selection: mediocre.
